EmailTemplate.name: MYA_BRD_MRT_1707_DNCE_Invasion_NL.Send - Conf.Email - Conf
EmailTemplate.subject: We've got your DNCE ticket waiting.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
<[[ https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/?fref=ts]]>
Thanks for your registration.
We look forward to see you at the party.
Please drop by the below address by 4th August to collect your tickets.
Pernod Ricard Malaysia
Suite 13 A01, Menara PJ, Amcorp Trade Centre, 18, Jalan Persiaran Barat, 46050 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
9 am – 5 pm
Telephone: 603 7953 8800*You must be at least 21 y/o and non-Muslim to sign up. You will have to show a valid ID and this confirmation eDM at Martell’s Follow the Swift Booth.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/martell]]>
<[[https://www.instagram.com/explore/locations/75798282/]]>
<[[https://www.pinterest.com/martell]]>
<[[https://www.twitter.com/martellcognac]]>
<[[https://www.youtube.com/user/Martell]]>
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
